dcterms:creator: Bob L. Sturm
dcterms:description: GTZAN is a dataset containing 1,000 tracks of 30-second length, used for genre classification tasks. The authors adopted a 'fault-filtered' split to minimize the impact of error labels.
dcterms:title: GTZAN

dcterms:creator: Edith Law
Kris West
Michael I. Mandel
Mert Bay
J. S. Downie
dcterms:description: MagnaTagATune (MTT) is a dataset used for automatic tagging, which involves finding the most appropriate tags for target songs. The authors limited the vocabulary to the top 50 most popular tags for training.
dcterms:title: MagnaTagATune (MTT)

dcterms:description: Free Music Archive (FMA) is a large-scale dataset for evaluating several tasks in Music Information Retrieval. The authors used a small balanced subset containing 8,000 clips.
dcterms:title: Free Music Archive (FMA)
